chapter.text: tabaraka alladhi biyadihi l-mul'ku wahuwa ʿala kulli shayin qadirun
alladhi khalaqa l-mawta wal-hayata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu ʿamalan wahuwa l-ʿazizu l-ghafuru
alladhi khalaqa sabʿa samawatin tibaqan ma tara fi khalqi l-rahmani min tafawutin fa-ir'jiʿi l-basara hal tara min futurin
thumma ir'jiʿi l-basara karratayni yanqalib ilayka l-basaru khasi-an wahuwa hasirun
walaqad zayyanna l-samaa l-dun'ya bimasabiha wajaʿalnaha rujuman lilshayatini wa-aʿtadna lahum ʿadhaba l-saʿiri
walilladhina kafaru birabbihim ʿadhabu jahannama wabi'sa l-masiru
idha ul'qu fiha samiʿu laha shahiqan wahiya tafuru
takadu tamayyazu mina l-ghayzi kullama ul'qiya fiha fawjun sa-alahum khazanatuha alam yatikum nadhirun
qalu bala qad jaana nadhirun fakadhabna waqul'na ma nazzala l-lahu min shayin in antum illa fi dalalin kabirin
waqalu law kunna nasmaʿu aw naʿqilu ma kunna fi ashabi l-saʿiri
fa-iʿ'tarafu bidhanbihim fasuh'qan li-ashabi l-saʿiri
inna alladhina yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabirun
wa-asirru qawlakum awi ij'haru bihi innahu ʿalimun bidhati l-suduri
ala yaʿlamu man khalaqa wahuwa l-latifu l-khabiru
huwa alladhi jaʿala lakumu l-arda dhalulan fa-im'shu fi manakibiha wakulu min riz'qihi wa-ilayhi l-nushuru
a-amintum man fi l-samai an yakhsifa bikumu l-arda fa-idha hiya tamuru
am amintum man fi l-samai an yur'sila ʿalaykum hasiban fasataʿlamuna kayfa nadhiri
walaqad kadhaba alladhina min qablihim fakayfa kana nakiri
awalam yaraw ila l-tayri fawqahum saffatin wayaqbid'na ma yum'sikuhunna illa l-rahmanu innahu bikulli shayin basirun
amman hadha alladhi huwa jundun lakum yansurukum min duni l-rahmani ini l-kafiruna illa fi ghururin
amman hadha alladhi yarzuqukum in amsaka riz'qahu bal lajju fi ʿutuwwin wanufurin
afaman yamshi mukibban ʿala wajhihi ahda amman yamshi sawiyyan ʿala siratin mus'taqimin
qul huwa alladhi ansha-akum wajaʿala lakumu l-samʿa wal-absara wal-afidata qalilan ma tashkuruna
qul huwa alladhi dhara-akum fi l-ardi wa-ilayhi tuh'sharuna
wayaquluna mata hadha l-waʿdu in kuntum sadiqina
qul innama l-ʿil'mu ʿinda l-lahi wa-innama ana nadhirun mubinun
falamma ra-awhu zul'fatan siat wujuhu alladhina kafaru waqila hadha alladhi kuntum bihi taddaʿuna
qul ara-aytum in ahlakaniya l-lahu waman maʿiya aw rahimana faman yujiru l-kafirina min ʿadhabin alimin
qul huwa l-rahmanu amanna bihi waʿalayhi tawakkalna fasataʿlamuna man huwa fi dalalin mubinin
qul ara-aytum in asbaha maukum ghawran faman yatikum bimain maʿinin
